function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Virus titer reduction on different surfaces","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of virus survivability on different surfaces","Mitigation":"Conduct further research and analysis to verify the accuracy of the findings","Technologies":"Laboratory testing equipment for virus titration","People":"Public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Exponential decay in virus titer across experimental conditions","Impact":"Underestimation of virus survivability and transmission potential","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols for all surfaces","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning and disinfection solutions","People":"Public, healthcare workers, facility management staff","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, facility management companies"},{"Description":"Variation in experimental data especially on cardboard surfaces","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of virus survivability on cardboard","Mitigation":"Conduct additional experiments to confirm the consistency of results on cardboard surfaces","Technologies":"Laboratory testing equipment for virus titration, environmental monitoring tools","People":"Public, packaging industry workers, delivery personnel","Owner":"Research institutions, packaging companies, logistics companies"}]}
